OOC: I'll work on The Watchers page and try to add to the history section. I suppose I can also look through the continuem characters and add any of the many random TF names I can remember from G1 that arn't listed. I'm sure Airly could fill in the whole Hydras/Megatron thing. It's been forever since that event took place.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  1. I'm trying to fill in some gaps in the wiki.  I am adding names, as they come up, to the continuum characters page.  I'll admit I don't know a lot about the characters from Transformers, if someone could add to that list, it would be good.   http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/wiki/continuum_character_list    (please use the template)

2. I'm unclear as to the relationship between Megatron and Hydras.  If someone could fill me in on that, or mention it on the Megatron page on the Continuum characters list, that would be good. 

3. A lot of characters have not been claimed yet, I know they're inactive, but it would be nice to straighten that out.  (the one's with red links haven't had a page written about them yet.  (again please use the template) 
http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/wiki/character_list 

4. NBW history. Not so important, but history facinates me.  I've tried to complile as much info as possible, but if some of you who've been around longer than me could fill me in, or add to the history section, that would be cool. 
http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/wiki/introduction

5. The story about the Mephilis slave ship is still a bit unlear as well.  I know it hasn't been talked about much in the actual RPG, but it would be nice to clear that up. 
http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/wiki/mephilis

6. Pages still need to be created for the Iron Skull Predacons and The Watchers.
 http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/wiki/summary

If you have time to work a little on this, I'd appreciate.  I'll try to do what I can. ^^
 
     
                       

 	      
---------------------------------
Ahhh...imagining that irresistible "new car" smell?
 Check outnew cars at Yahoo! Autos.
